Package com.iceybones.scheduler.controllers

Class CustTabController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.iceybones.scheduler.controllers.CustTabController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class CustTabController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    Logic controller pertaining to the customer tab of the main scene.

      Opens the appointment tab with the add new appointment button selected and the tool drawer pre-populated with the currently selected customer.

      Gathers all the input data from the tool drawer elements and calls the relevant confirm method when the custConfirmBtn is pressed.

      Open the tool drawer when the deleteCustomerBtn is pressed.

      Open the tool drawer when the editCustomerBtn is pressed.

      Makes a request to the Database class to perform a COMMIT on the database.

      Attempts to activate the custConfirmBtn when a selection is made in the stateComboBox.

      Tries to activate the custConfirmBtn whenever a key is typed in any of the toolbar text fields.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize​(java.net.URL url,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle rb)
        Sets up the scene GUI components utilizing the resource bundle for text values. A lambda expression is used to implement the ChangeListener interface and provide extra functionality for when users select items in the custTableView.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
        Parameters:
        url - the url of the scene's fxml layout
        rb - the currently loaded resource bundle

        void setMainController​(MainController mainController)

        Parameters:
        mainController - the parent controller

      • populate

        void populate()
        Calls populate on both customer table and the countryComboBox.

      • setupTable

        private void setupTable()
        Links columns of the customer table with corresponding customer object values.

      • populateTable

        void populateTable()
        Gets all customer data from the Database class and uses it to populate the table view. A lambda expression is used to implement the Runnable interface and submit a new task to the database to fetch the customer records. Three more Runnable lambdas are nested inside to update GUI components on the JavaFX thread. A notification is displayed if the database request fails for any reason.

      • populateCountryBox

        private void populateCountryBox()
        Gets all country data from the Database class and uses it to populate the countryComboBox. A lambda expression is used to implement the Runnable interface and submit a new task to the database to fetch the country records. Two more Runnable lambdas are nested inside to update GUI components on the JavaFX thread. A notification is displayed if the database request fails for any reason.

      • populateStateBox

        private void populateStateBox​(Country country)
        Gets all division data from the Database class and uses it to populate the stateComboBox. A lambda expression is used to implement the Runnable interface and submit a new task to the database to fetch the division records. Two more Runnable lambdas are nested inside to update GUI components on the JavaFX thread. A notification is displayed if the database request fails for any reason.
        Parameters:
        country - used to select relevant states

      • openToolDrawer

        private void openToolDrawer​(Customer cust)
        Opens the tool drawer and populates the GUI elements with data from the provided customer.
        Parameters:

      • setValHelper

        private void setValHelper​(javafx.scene.control.ComboBoxBase box,
                          java.lang.Object val)
        Helper method used to implement a workaround that allows the caller to change the GUI subject's value without having its onAction event fired.
        Parameters:
        box - the GUI element that will be operated on
        val - the new value that is to be applied to the subject

      • confirmAdd

        private void confirmAdd​(Customer customer)
        Sends a request to the Database class to INSERT a new customer record. A lambda expression is used to implement the Runnable interface and submit a new task to the database to perform the operation. Three more Runnable lambdas are nested inside to update GUI components on the JavaFX thread. A notification is displayed to report the success or failure of the operation.
        Parameters:
        customer - the new customer that is to be added

      • confirmDelete

        private void confirmDelete​(Customer customer)
        Sends a request to the Database class to DELETE a customer record. A lambda expression is used to implement the Runnable interface and submit a new task to the database to perform the operation. Three more Runnable lambdas are nested inside to update GUI components on the JavaFX thread. A notification is displayed to report the success or failure of the operation.
        Parameters:
        customer - the customer that is to be deleted

      • confirmUpdate

        private void confirmUpdate​(Customer newCust,
                           Customer original)
        Sends a request to the Database class to UPDATE a customer record. A lambda expression is used to implement the Runnable interface and submit a new task to the database to perform the operation. Three more Runnable lambdas are nested inside to update GUI components on the JavaFX thread. A notification is displayed to report the success or failure of the operation.
        Parameters:
        newCust - a customer object holding the data that is to be copied unto the original
        original - the customer that is to be updated

      • tryActivateConfirmBtn

        private void tryActivateConfirmBtn()
        Activates the custConfirmBtn if all the required values are present in the toolbar's inputs.

      • onActionConfirm

        private void onActionConfirm()
        Gathers all the input data from the tool drawer elements and calls the relevant confirm method when the custConfirmBtn is pressed.

      • onActionAddCust

        private void onActionAddCust()
        Open the tool drawer when the addCustomerBtn is pressed.

      • onActionDeleteCust

        private void onActionDeleteCust()
        Open the tool drawer when the deleteCustomerBtn is pressed.

      • onActionEditCust

        private void onActionEditCust()
        Open the tool drawer when the editCustomerBtn is pressed.

      • onActionAddCustApp

        private void onActionAddCustApp()
        Opens the appointment tab with the add new appointment button selected and the tool drawer pre-populated with the currently selected customer.

      • onActionCountryComboBox

        private void onActionCountryComboBox()
        When the countryComboBox is selected, populates the stateComboBox with the states corresponding to the selected country.

      • onActionStateComboBox

        private void onActionStateComboBox()
        Attempts to activate the custConfirmBtn when a selection is made in the stateComboBox.

      • onActionRefresh

        private void onActionRefresh()
        Makes a request to the Database class to perform a COMMIT on the database. This deselects any selected items and closes the tool drawer. A lambda expression is used to implement the Runnable interface and submit a new task to the database to perform the COMMIT. Three more Runnable lambdas are nested inside to update GUI components on the JavaFX thread. A notification is displayed to report the success or failure of this request.

      • onKeyTypedCustField

        private void onKeyTypedCustField()
        Tries to activate the custConfirmBtn whenever a key is typed in any of the toolbar text fields.
